type.name: org.gradle.api.file.DeleteSpec
type.description: * A specification for deleting files from the filesystem.

method.name: delete
method.description: * Specifies the files to delete. * * @param files the list of files which should be deleted. Any type of object * accepted by {@link org.gradle.api.Project#files(Object...)}

method.name: setFollowSymlinks
method.description: * Specifies whether or not symbolic links should be followed during deletion. * * @param followSymlinks deletion will follow symlniks when true.

property.name: followSymlinks
property.description: * Specifies whether or not symbolic links should be followed during deletion. * * @param followSymlinks deletion will follow symlniks when true.
